content: while knitting my way through a bunch of yarn for a raverly group i realized i was leaving half-skeins of yarn left and right unused in my knitting basket i ve been trying to knit through a skein before i start a next one and so having all these half-skeins laying about was starting to bother me to remedy the situation i whipped up a hat pattern that is easy to memorize can be made solid or striped with great results either way and will help you use up all your half-skeins of yarn in no time molly s hats can be knit up using wool blended acrylic and even cotton yarn i ve been using the pattern to knit up nest maine hats by the bundle named molly s hats these hats are named after molly weasley and her love of hand-knits in the harry potter movies i like to imagine molly weasley didn t just knit for her own children and their friends but that she used her needles to knit for as many folks as she could - this hat pattern was created with that charitable spirit in mind
